Rwanda - Power Project : Credit 1495 -
            Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Rwanda - Power Project : Credit
            1495 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Rwanda - Power Project : Credit 1495 -
            Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Rwanda - Power Project : Credit
            1495 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
(i) Objectives and Benefits: The Power
            Network Rehabilitation will complement the recently approved
            Ruzizi II regional hydroelectric project by enabling Rwanda
            to take maximum advantage of the increased output from the
            new facilities. Specifically, the Project will: (a) provide
            improved reliability of production, transmission and
            distribution of electrical energy; (b) serve additional
            domestic consumers; (c) help sustain the economic growth of
            the industrial and commerical sectors. Finally, it will; (d)
            strengthen Electrogaz in planning, personnel management, and
            its operation and maintenance functions. (ii) Components:
            The project will provide for: (a) the rehabilitation of the
            Ntaruka generating station and of the transmission network;
            (b) the extension of the transmission network; (c) technical
            assistance to Electrogaz; training; and consulting
            engineering services.

abstracts.cdata!:
(i) Objectives and Benefits:  The Power
            Network Rehabilitation will complement the recently approved
            Ruzizi II regional hydroelectric project by enabling Rwanda
            to take maximum advantage of the increased output from the
            new facilities.  Specifically, the Project will:  (a)
            provide improved reliability of production, transmission and
            distribution of electrical energy; (b) serve additional
            domestic consumers; (c) help sustain the economic growth of
            the industrial and commerical sectors.  Finally, it will;
            (d) strengthen Electrogaz in planning, personnel management,
            and its operation and maintenance functions.  (ii)
            Components:  The project will provide for: (a) the
            rehabilitation of the Ntaruka generating station and of the
            transmission network; (b) the extension of the transmission
            network; (c) technical assistance to Electrogaz; training;
            and consulting engineering services.
